title: OREMAKE 8-INCH Kiritsuke Chef's Knife, Japanese Damascus T-CO Steel 69-Layer Forged Cooking Knife, Multi-Purpose Professional Kitchen Knife for cutting, slicing, paring, Ergonomic G10 Handle
features: 【New Japanese Damascus steel】Forged 69-layer construction with a T-CO steel core provides excellent toughness, strength, and durability. The core is flanked by 2 layers of nickel alloy for added corrosion resistance.

【Exceptional sharpness and edge retention】The T-CO core has a higher carbon content than AUS-10 or VG-10 and boasts a hardness of 60±2 HRC (Rockwell) achieved by a vacuum heat treatment, resulting in an extremely sharp blade that holds its edge well.

【Efficient slicer】The 1.9 mm thin blade has a cutting edge hand-sharpened to a 9-13 degree angle per side. It glides effortlessly through food with clean, precise cuts. The reverse tanto tip allows delicate precision work.

【Superb control and comfort】The knife is precision-engineered with a perfect balance between the blade and handle for optimal control. Its handle is ergonomically shaped to fit comfortably in your hand.
【Long-lasting G10 handle】The G10 handle is highly resistant to heat, cold, water penetration, as well as acids, and it will not deform, break, chip, or wear. It is well-polished for easy cleaning.
description: The OreMake Sheepdog knife series strives to meet the needs of culinary enthusiasts. This series combines a look inspired by Sheepdog pocket knives with the latest Japanese Damascus steel (T-CO69). It boasts a forged 69-layer construction that creates an eye-pleasing Damascus pattern and protects and strengthens the core. With a higher carbon content than AUS-10 or VG-10, the T-CO steel core provides superior out-of-the-box sharpness and edge retention. The 2 flanking layers of nickel alloy improve the core’s corrosion resistance. Each knife is perfectly balanced with an ergonomic, brass-accented G10 handle for comfortable control and a high-end look. The Nakiri knife is a Japanese-style vegetable knife designed for chopping, slicing, and dicing vegetables and herbs. It is also excellent for cutting fruits. The Kiritsuke knife is a multipurpose Japanese-style knife with the main purpose of slicing fish. It can also be used to slice meat or cut vegetables, herbs, and fruits.
